climber.long: Passive. Ignores vertical movement penalties. Cannot move through Impassable terrain.

berserk.short: Must charge nearest enemy; +1 die in melee.
berserk.long: Passive. Must move toward nearest visible enemy. Gain +1 die on melee; cannot Interact.

disengage.long: Main Action. Leave base contact without penalty or triggering enemy reactions.

grapple.short: Hit to pull enemy 3" and root them.
grapple.long: Main Action. Melee attack: On hit, pull target 3" toward self; target cannot move next activation.

runner.short: Extra Move if no attacks are made.
runner.long: Passive. If no attacks are made during activation, make an additional Move at the end.

mobile_cover.short: Adjacent allies gain +1 Defense vs ranged.
mobile_cover.long: Passive. Adjacent friendly models gain +1 Defense vs ranged (does not stack with terrain).

mobile_dynamo.long: Main Action. Projects 12" Electromagik field. Hexan and Jäger within field may use abilities. Moving reduces this turn's field to 6". Counts as Dynamo Generator for Electromagik dependency.

mobile_cell_block.long: Passive. Transports Captured models. If destroyed, prisoners are released.

stampede.long: Passive. May pass through smaller models. Those models must test Morale or be pushed 1" aside.

immobile.long: Passive. Cannot move. May still attack/defend. Only repositioned by scenario/special rules.

stealth.long: Passive. Enemies shooting from 9"+ suffer -1 to hit.

load_and_carry.long: Passive. May pick up and carry objectives, Thyr crystals, or Spare Parts without penalty. Move speed unaffected.

cut_and_run.long: Reactive. When targeted by an attack (before dice are rolled), this model may immediately move up to 3". If it does, it drops any carried item at its original location.

extraction_priority.short: Bonus VP for exiting with objectives.
extraction_priority.long: Passive. If this unit exits the table while carrying an objective or Thyr crystal, gain +2 VP (in addition to objective value).

slip_away.long: Passive. May leave melee combat without penalty or free strikes.

darting_attack.long: Passive. After shooting, may move up to 3" even if already moved this activation.

leaper.long: Passive. Instead of normal movement, this unit may leap 2d6" in any direction, ignoring terrain and units. It can leap over or onto 1-story buildings or similar obstacles. On a roll of double 1s (snake eyes), the unit pulls a muscle: it loses the Leaper ability for the rest of the game and immediately suffers 1 Quality damage.

random_movement.long: Passive. At the start of this unit's activation, roll 1d8 or use scatter die to determine direction (1=NE, 2=E, 3=SE, 4=S, 5=SW, 6=W, 7=NW, 8=N), then move up to its Move stat in that direction. Stop if it contacts terrain/units or would move off the board. If forced off board, remove from play (counts as exited/fled).

boardwalk_blitzer.short: Double speed on boardwalks; bonus action.
boardwalk_blitzer.long: Passive. Moves at double speed on boardwalks. After moving on a boardwalk, may immediately take one additional action (attack or interact).

flying.long: Passive. This unit ignores terrain while moving and may move over units and obstacles. Cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker also has Flying or a rule that allows it. Unit's Move is considered Flying.

barely_controlled.long: Passive. At the start of its activation, this unit must move at least 6". If it cannot, or chooses not to, it must pass a Quality test or immediately Crash Land.

crash_landing.long: Passive. When this unit fails Barely Controlled or is destroyed while Flying, place the model on the table. All units within 3" suffer 1 automatic hit and are Pinned.
